page.title: 08SHOPPING IN SALISBURY
page.content: WE CATCH THE BUS INTO AMESBURY AND THEN WE GET ANOTHER ONE INTO SALISBURY.WE TRAVEL THIS WAY BECAUSE IT IS CHEAPER - STRAIGHT TO SALISBURY IT WOULD COST Â£1.27. IN SALISBURY THE FIRST PLACE WE GO TO IS A CAFE,SO WE DON'T GET HUNGRY DURING OUR SHOPPING. WE USUALLY GO TO THE MARKET AND BUY FRESH VEGETABLES. WE GO AND LOOK AT ALL THE SHOE SHOPS AND CLOTHES SHOPS TO SEE IF WE CAN SPEND OUR POCKET MONEY, Â£8; AFTER WE'VE BEEN TO BEJAM'S AND GOT FROZEN FOOD, THEN WE GO TO TESCO'S WHERE WE GET MOST OF OUR FOOD. ALL THIS FOOD HAS TO LAST US A MONTH. WHEN WE HAVE FINISHED WE GO TO THE WIMPEY AND HAVE A HAMBURGHER, CHIPS AND COKE. AFTER THIS WE GO DOWN TO THE BUS DEPOT AND HIRE A TAXI TAKE US HOME.
